org.cougaar.core.mobility.ldm
Interface MoveAgent

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable, UniqueObject
public interface MoveAgent
extends UniqueObject

A request that an agent be moved from its current node to a different node.

This has been replaced by the "AgentControl" API, but there's no rush to switch to the new API.

See Also:
AgentControl

Nested Class Summary
static class MoveAgent.Status
          Immutable class that represents the dynamic status of the move request.

getSource

MessageAddress getSource()
Address of the agent that requested the move.

getTicket

Ticket getTicket()
Get the move ticket.

If the ticket's "getMobileAgent()" is null then the requesting agent will be moved (a "rover" agent).

See Also:
Ticket

getStatus

MoveAgent.Status getStatus()
Get the current status to the request.

setStatus

void setStatus(MoveAgent.Status status)
For infrastructure use only!. Allows the infrastructure to set the status. Only valid if (local-agent == req.agentToMove)
